amendment.description: Amendment sought to create a program to provide grants for teachers who take sabbatical leave to pursue study for professional development.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 10 printed in H.Rept. 106-240 to create a program to provide grants for teachers who take sabbatical leave to pursue study for professional development.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mink amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 242 (Roll no. 317).
